entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 03:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 3.7°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain at times heavy late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Local snowfall amount 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
